title: Contract and 956 Form
description: A contract is a legally binding agreement, and the 956 Form (IRS Form 8850) is a document used for pre-screening job applicants eligible for the Work Opportunity Tax Credit.

title: Payment Collection/confirmation in Account/Invoice
description: Payment Collection is the process of obtaining funds from a customer, Confirmation in Account involves verifying financial transactions, and an Invoice is a document requesting payment for goods or services provided.

title: Collect Documents & Prepare lodgement
description: Collecting documents involves gathering necessary paperwork, while preparing lodgement entails organizing and submitting these documents for processing or filing.

title: Lodge skill assessment
description: Lodging a skill assessment involves submitting necessary documentation and information for evaluation to assess one's professional qualifications and skills.

title: Sent confirmation to Client about lodgement of Skill assessment
description: Sending confirmation to the client about the lodgement of the skill assessment involves notifying them that the submission has been successfully submitted for evaluation.

title: Received Skill assessment
description: Receiving a skill assessment means obtaining the evaluation results that assess one's professional qualifications and skills.

title: Communication with Client
description: Communication with a client involves the exchange of information, updates, and discussions to address their needs or provide relevant updates on a particular matter.
